scripts.build:local: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/index.html --out-dir dist --target browser --no-content-hash --no-cache --no-source-maps --no-autoinstall && cp src/sitemap.xml dist/sitemap.xml
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production parcel build src/index.html --out-dir dist --public-url https://dbs.com/design --target browser --no-content-hash --no-cache --no-source-maps --no-autoinstall && cp src/sitemap.xml dist/sitemap.xml
